TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 代表一個 Windows 狀態列控制項。

span.span: Represents a Windows status bar control.

summary.span: 雖然 會取代並且將功能加入至之前版本的 控制項；不過，也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，控制項組成物件，其中每個顯示文字及/或圖示。Typically, a control consists of objects, each of which displays text and/or an icon. 您也可以提供為主控描繪面板，以提供自訂的面板，例如進度列或一系列的映像，會顯示應用程式的狀態。You can also provide owner-drawn panels to provide custom panels such as a progress bar or a series of images that displays the state of your application. A控制項通常會顯示上正在檢視之物件的相關資訊，物件的元件或在您的應用程式中的該物件的作業與相關內容資訊。A control typically displays information about an object being viewed on a , the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application. 控制項也提供可讓您自訂控制項的外觀屬性。The control provides properties that enable you to customize the appearance of the control. 如果會顯示在表單上可以調整大小，您可以使用屬性，可對使用者指出，表單所能調整的表單的右下角顯示可調整大小的底框。If the is displayed on a form that can be resized, you can use the property to display a sizing grip in the lower-right corner of the form to indicate to users that the form can be resized. 屬性可讓您顯示面板內您或顯示的值控制項的屬性。The property enables you to display panels within your or to display only the value of the property of the control. 預設 沒有面板。The default has no panels. 若要將面板加入您可以使用方法類別可透過存取控制項的屬性。To add panels to a you can use the method of the class that is accessible through the property of the control. 您也可以使用透過提供物件屬性設為從控制項移除面板，並存取特定操作面板。You can also use the object provided through the property to remove panels from the control and access a specific to manipulate the panel. 如果您想要判斷何時物件內按一下控制項時，您可以建立事件處理常式事件。If you want to determine when a object within a control is clicked, you can create an event handler for the event. 若要執行主控描繪在面板上的作業，您可以建立事件處理常式事件。To perform owner-draw operations on a panel, you can create an event handler for the event. 傳遞至事件處理常式的事件資料來繪製面板上提供資訊和物件用來執行繪製工作。The event data passed to the event handler provides information on the panel to draw and a object to use to perform drawing tasks. 當您建立的執行個體，讀取/寫入屬性會設為初始值。When you create an instance of , the read/write properties are set to initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的控制項並加入兩個物件。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 其中一個命名的物件`panel1`，會顯示應用程式的狀態文字。One of the objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二個具名`panel2`、 顯示目前的日期，並使用屬性類別，以顯示目前的時間。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 此範例會使用屬性，以確保面板會顯示而不是標準的面板，，而且它會使用和屬性來存取方法若要將面板加入。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此範例也會使用， ， ，和屬性，以初始化物件。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 這個範例需要在範例中定義的方法是定義和呼叫的建構函式從。This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設 沒有面板。The default has no panels. 當您建立的執行個體，下列的讀取/寫入屬性會設為初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||`false`| ||`true`| 您可以變更這些屬性，透過呼叫另一個屬性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構並用， ， ， ，和成員以及如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a and use the , , , , and members and how to handle the event. 要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼在表單中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 呼叫`InitializeStatusBarPanels`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 處置 (Dispose) 所使用的資源 (除了記憶體之外)。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出這個控制項是否應該使用次要緩衝區來重繪其介面，以減少或防止重繪閃動，不過，這個屬性對於 控制項沒有任何影響。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker, however this property has no effect on the control

value.span: 如果控制項具有次要緩衝區，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control has a secondary buffer; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性有任何作用控制項，因此它不會顯示在設計工具或 intellisense。Setting this property has no effect on the control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DrawItem As StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於主控描繪狀態列控制項的視覺外觀變更時。

span.span: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn status bar control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此事件於描繪執行繪圖作業控制項。You can use this event to perform drawing operations in an owner-drawn control. 例如，如果您顯示描繪會顯示進度列，您可以使用這個事件來執行的進度列繪圖面板上。For example, if you display an owner-drawn that displays a progress bar, you can use this event to perform the drawing of the progress bar on the panel. 提供給透過事件的資料做為參數傳遞至事件處理常式的物件可讓您判斷需要繪製的面板和用來繪製面板。The data provided to the event through the object passed as a parameter to the event handler enables you to determine the panel that needs to be drawn and the to use to draw to the panel. 此事件，才引發的時機屬性中控制設為 。This event is only raised when the property of a in a control is set to . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立描繪顯示自訂背景和目前的日期。The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn that displays a custom background and the current date. 這個範例需要您已連接事件範例中定義的事件處理常式的控制項。This example requires that you have connected the event of a control to the event handler defined in the example. [!code-cpp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立描繪顯示自訂背景和目前的日期。The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn that displays a custom background and the current date. 這個範例需要您已連接事件範例中定義的事件處理常式的控制項。This example requires that you have connected the event of a control to the event handler defined in the example. [!code-cpp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/VB/form1.vb#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

Protected Overrides Sub OnResize (e As EventArgs)

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需概觀，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For an overview, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PanelClick As StatusBarPanelClickEventHandler

summary.span: 發生在當 控制項上的 物件被按一下時。

span.span: Occurs when a object on a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個事件來執行工作時內的面板按一下控制項時。You can use this event to perform tasks when a panel within a control is clicked. 提供給透過事件的資料形式的事件處理常式的參數可讓您判斷傳遞，按下的使用者才能執行工作上所選取的面板。The data provided to the event through the passed as a parameter to the event handler enables you to determine the that was clicked by the user in order to perform tasks on the selected panel. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ， ， ，和成員以及如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and members and how to handle the event. 要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼在表單中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 呼叫`InitializeStatusBarPanels`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Panels As StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection

summary.span: 取得控制項中所包含的 面板集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of panels contained within the control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項的 物件。

span.span: A containing the objects of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以顯示的面板，以提供資訊給應用程式的使用者數目。The control can display a number of panels to provide information to the user of your application. 例如，面板可以顯示目前的時間] 或 [檔案下載的進度。For example, a panel could display the current time or the progress of a file download. 顯示每個面板控制項是的執行個體類別。Each panel displayed by the control is an instance of the class. 屬性可讓您取得的集合參考物件的目前儲存在控制項。The property enables you to obtain a reference to the collection of objects that are currently stored in the control. 與這個參考中，您可以將面板加入、 移除面板、 存取，集合內的特定面板和取得計數中的面板控制項。With this reference, you can add panels, remove panels, access a specific panel within the collection, and obtain a count of the panels in the control. 如需有關可使用的面板集合執行工作的詳細資訊，請參閱類別參考主題。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the panel collection, see the class reference topics. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的控制項並加入兩個物件。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 其中一個命名的物件`panel1`，會顯示應用程式的狀態文字。One of the objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二個物件，名為`panel2`、 顯示目前的日期，並使用屬性類別，以顯示目前的時間。The second object, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 此範例會使用屬性，以確保面板會顯示而不是標準的面板，，而且它會使用和屬性來存取方法若要將面板加入。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此範例也會使用， ， ，和屬性，以初始化物件。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 這個範例需要在範例中定義的方法是定義和呼叫的建構函式從。This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowPanels { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否顯示已加入控制項的面板。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether any panels that have been added to the control are displayed.

value.span: 如果顯示面板，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if panels are displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項顯示的值及其沒有任何面板的屬性。By default, the control displays the value of its property without any panels. 當`ShowPanels`設為`true`，任何物件中指定顯示控制項。When `ShowPanels` is set to `true`, any objects specified in the control are displayed. 當您建立的執行個體時，一開始會建立沒有面板類別。No panels are initially created when you create an instance of the class. 您可以將面板加入控制項使用方法類別。You can add panels to a control by using the method of the class. 這個集合類別可以透過存取屬性。This collection class can be accessed through the property of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的控制項並加入兩個物件。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 其中一個命名的物件`panel1`，會顯示應用程式的狀態文字。One of the objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二個具名`panel2`、 顯示目前的日期，並使用屬性類別，以顯示目前的時間。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 此範例會使用屬性，以確保面板會顯示而不是標準的面板，，而且它會使用和屬性來存取方法若要將面板加入。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此範例也會使用， ， ，和屬性，以初始化物件。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 這個範例需要在範例中定義的方法是定義和呼叫的建構函式從。This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SizingGrip { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在控制項的右下角顯示可調整大小的底框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a sizing grip is displayed in the lower-right corner of the control.

value.span: 如果顯示可調整大小的底框，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a sizing grip is displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，以顯示可調整大小的底框來調整表單時，提供指示給使用者。You can use this property to display a sizing grip to provide an indication to the user when a form is resizable. 如果屬性您設為不是可調整大小，例如框線樣式或，您應該設定屬性`false`以防止思考可能是表單的使用者調整大小。If the property of your is set to a border style that is not resizable, such as or , you should set the property to `false` to prevent the user from thinking that the form can be resized. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ， ， ，和成員以及如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and members and how to handle the event. 要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼在表單中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 呼叫`InitializeStatusBarPanels`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理常式。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會表示控制項所顯示的文字。This property represents the text displayed by the control. > [!CAUTION] > 控制項會顯示字串的第一個 127 個字元。The control displays only the first 127 characters of a string. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼在表單中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 呼叫`InitializeSimpleStatusBar`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeSimpleStatusBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
